name: Song Scraper
description: This extension allows you to view which tracks have been added or removed from the current YouTube Music or Google Play Music playlist.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; connect-src https://*.googleapis.com; style-src-elem https://cdn.firebase.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src https://www.gstatic.com; style-src 'unsafe-inline'; script-src-elem 'self' https://apis.google.com/; frame-src https://song-scraper.firebaseapp.com/
